item.title: Covid 19 Mortality
item.description: Analysis of mortality rates based on several input variables On this page, we are going to look in more detail at the deadliness of Covid-19. We know that the virus has spread across the world over the last few months, sending terror into the minds of billions worldwide. However, is it as deadly as we think it is? Is there evidence to show that people must be extremely worried about this virus.

item.title: Ipsum
item.description: Hello hello how are you, hope everything’s alright

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
